author: jeffbi
body:
Addresses parts of #4148 

Add coverage for `Get-Item`, `Get-ChildItem`, `Set-Item`, and `Clear-Item`

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
Missing tests:

- [x] [invalid hive root](https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/src/master/src/System.Management.Automation/namespaces/RegistryProvider.cs#L174)
- [x] validate `-whatif` works for `set-item` and `clear-item`
- [x] attempt accessing path you don't have access to

comments.author: jeffbi
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT These test run with the tag `RequireAdminOnWindows`. Is there a Registry path that admin would not have access to?

comments.author: jeffbi
comments.body:
Typos fixed.

The Travis failure seems to be in a test for Invoke-Item.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @jeffbi I have a PR to change the invoke-item tests to Feature as they shouldn't be CI anyways, I'll restart the Mac job, there's a chance it'll pass as it's a timing issue

title: Add test coverage for Registry
